short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be notified when Angelskimi begins her stream!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to notify users when Angelskimi stream (https://www.twitch.tv/angelskimi) is live! 

Never miss a stream and find all of her social links in the popup!
Find quick and easy access to her stream, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube links.

Pro Tip: If you hover over the stream preview and click the twitch icon, it'll take you directly to her twitch stream!
